department: Public Works and Government Services of Canada
short_summary: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by November 22, 2022 at 14:00 EST.",
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by November 22, 2022 at 14:00 EST. All bids submitted after 14:00 EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.",
